snippet: The authorities said the gunman was last seen three days after the killing near a relative’s home in South Carolina, where he was already on probation for federal grand larceny charges.
abstract: New York City Police release photo of Brendrick Brown, suspect in shooting death of Dune Janelle Jacobs in North Bronx; say Brown was a member of the Young Guns gang and killed Jacobs, who he mistakenly suspected of being a member of a rival gang; police have arrested three other men in connection with shooting.
lead_paragraph: The authorities said the gunman was last seen three days after the killing near a relative’s home in South Carolina, where he was already on probation for federal grand larceny charges.

headline.main: Shooting Victim in the Bronx Was Mistaken for Gang Member, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Shooting Victim Was Mistaken for Gang Member, Police Say
